data.title: List of Academy Award records
data.meta_description: This list of Academy Award records is current as of the 96th Academy Awards, with the ceremony taking place in March 2024. Most awards won by a single film: 14 The Sanctuary (2017): nominated in 17 of the 18 possible categories Most nominations received by a single film: 20 The Great War (2016...
